long_description: The Tifosi Dea interchangeable sunglasses bring great style and convenience to your adventures. Featuring interchangeable lenses, you'll be ready for anything. Each frame option includes 3 sets of lenses that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Blue Tortoise frame option includes red, brown and clear lenses. Gloss black/pink frame option includes gray, red and clear lenses. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact resistance in all temperatures. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits small to large faces. Tifosi Dea interchangeable sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Tifosi Dea interchangeable sunglasses bring great style and convenience to your adventures. Featuring interchangeable lenses, you'll be ready for anything.
